54 PerceptionWidget::PerceptionWidget(QWidget* parent, const MoveItConfigDataPtr& config_data)
55  : SetupScreenWidget(parent), config_data_(config_data)
56 {
57  // Basic widget container
58  QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout();
59  layout->setAlignment(Qt::AlignTop);
60 
61  // Top Header Area ------------------------------------------------
62 
63  HeaderWidget* header =
64  new HeaderWidget("Setup 3D Perception Sensors",
65  "Configure your 3D sensors to work with MoveIt "
66  "Please see <a "
67  "href='http://docs.ros.org/kinetic/api/moveit_tutorials/html/doc/perception_pipeline/"
68  "perception_pipeline_tutorial.html'>Perception Documentation</a> "
69  "for more details.",
70  this);
71  layout->addWidget(header);
72 
73  // Add spacing
74  QSpacerItem* blank_space = new QSpacerItem(1, 8);
75  layout->addSpacerItem(blank_space);
76 
77  // Plugin type combo box
78  QLabel* plugin_field_title = new QLabel(this);
79  plugin_field_title->setText("Optionally choose a type of 3D sensor plugin to configure:");
80  layout->addWidget(plugin_field_title);
81 
82  sensor_plugin_field_ = new QComboBox(this);
83  sensor_plugin_field_->setEditable(false);
84  sensor_plugin_field_->setMaximumWidth(600);
85  connect(sensor_plugin_field_, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(int)), this, SLOT(sensorPluginChanged(int)));
86  layout->addWidget(sensor_plugin_field_);
87 
88  // Point Cloud group -------------------------------------------
89  point_cloud_group_ = new QGroupBox("Point Cloud");
90 
91  QFormLayout* point_cloud_form_layout = new QFormLayout();
92  point_cloud_form_layout->setContentsMargins(0, 15, 0, 15);
93 
94  // Point Cloud Topic
95  point_cloud_topic_field_ = new QLineEdit(this);
96  point_cloud_topic_field_->setMaximumWidth(400);
97  // point_cloud_topic_field_->setText(QString("/clud topic"));
98  point_cloud_form_layout->addRow("Point Cloud Topic:", point_cloud_topic_field_);
99 
100  // Max Range
101  max_range_field_ = new QLineEdit(this);
102  max_range_field_->setMaximumWidth(400);
103  point_cloud_form_layout->addRow("Max Range:", max_range_field_);
104 
105  // Point Subsample
106  point_subsample_field_ = new QLineEdit(this);
107  point_subsample_field_->setMaximumWidth(400);
108  point_cloud_form_layout->addRow("Point Subsample:", point_subsample_field_);
109 
110  // Padding Offset
111  padding_offset_field_ = new QLineEdit(this);
112  padding_offset_field_->setMaximumWidth(400);
113  point_cloud_form_layout->addRow("Padding Offset:", padding_offset_field_);
114 
115  // Padding Scale
116  padding_scale_field_ = new QLineEdit(this);
117  padding_scale_field_->setMaximumWidth(400);
118  point_cloud_form_layout->addRow("Padding Scale:", padding_scale_field_);
119 
120  // Filtered Cloud Topic
121  filtered_cloud_topic_field_ = new QLineEdit(this);
122  filtered_cloud_topic_field_->setMaximumWidth(400);
123  point_cloud_form_layout->addRow("Filtered Cloud Topic:", filtered_cloud_topic_field_);
124 
125  // Max Update Rate
126  max_update_rate_field_ = new QLineEdit(this);
127  max_update_rate_field_->setMaximumWidth(400);
128  point_cloud_form_layout->addRow("Max Update Rate:", max_update_rate_field_);
129 
130  // Piont Cloud form layout
131  point_cloud_group_->setLayout(point_cloud_form_layout);
132  layout->addWidget(point_cloud_group_);
133 
134  // Depth map group --------------------------------------------
135  depth_map_group_ = new QGroupBox("Depth Map");
136 
137  // Depth Map form layout
138  QFormLayout* depth_map_form_layout = new QFormLayout();
139  depth_map_form_layout->setContentsMargins(0, 15, 0, 15);
140 
141  // Image Topic
142  image_topic_field_ = new QLineEdit(this);
143  image_topic_field_->setMaximumWidth(400);
144  depth_map_form_layout->addRow("Image Topic:", image_topic_field_);
145 
146  // Queue Size
147  queue_size_field_ = new QLineEdit(this);
148  queue_size_field_->setMaximumWidth(400);
149  depth_map_form_layout->addRow("Queue Size:", queue_size_field_);
150 
151  // Near Clipping Plane Distance
152  near_clipping_field_ = new QLineEdit(this);
153  near_clipping_field_->setMaximumWidth(400);
154  depth_map_form_layout->addRow("Near Clipping Plane Distance:", near_clipping_field_);
155 
156  // Far Clipping Plane Distance
157  far_clipping_field_ = new QLineEdit(this);
158  far_clipping_field_->setMaximumWidth(400);
159  depth_map_form_layout->addRow("Far Clipping Plane Distance:", far_clipping_field_);
160 
161  // Shadow Threshold
162  shadow_threshold_field_ = new QLineEdit(this);
163  shadow_threshold_field_->setMaximumWidth(400);
164  depth_map_form_layout->addRow("Shadow Threshold:", shadow_threshold_field_);
165 
166  // Padding Offset
167  depth_padding_offset_field_ = new QLineEdit(this);
168  depth_padding_offset_field_->setMaximumWidth(400);
169  depth_map_form_layout->addRow("Padding Offset:", depth_padding_offset_field_);
170 
171  // Padding Scale
172  depth_padding_scale_field_ = new QLineEdit(this);
173  depth_padding_scale_field_->setMaximumWidth(400);
174  depth_map_form_layout->addRow("Padding Scale:", depth_padding_scale_field_);
175 
176  // Filtered Cloud Topic
177  depth_filtered_cloud_topic_field_ = new QLineEdit(this);
178  depth_filtered_cloud_topic_field_->setMaximumWidth(400);
179  depth_map_form_layout->addRow("Filtered Cloud Topic:", depth_filtered_cloud_topic_field_);
180 
181  // Filtered Cloud Topic
182  depth_max_update_rate_field_ = new QLineEdit(this);
183  depth_max_update_rate_field_->setMaximumWidth(400);
184  depth_map_form_layout->addRow("Max Update Rate:", depth_max_update_rate_field_);
185 
186  depth_map_group_->setLayout(depth_map_form_layout);
187  layout->addWidget(depth_map_group_);
188 
189  layout->setAlignment(Qt::AlignTop);
190 
191  // Finish Layout --------------------------------------------------
192  this->setLayout(layout);
193 }
194 
195 // ******************************************************************************************
196 // Received when this widget is chosen from the navigation menu
197 // ******************************************************************************************
198 void PerceptionWidget::focusGiven()
199 {
200  loadSensorPluginsComboBox();
201 }
202 
203 // ******************************************************************************************
204 // Received when another widget is chosen from the navigation menu
205 // ******************************************************************************************
206 bool PerceptionWidget::focusLost()
207 {
208  // Save the sensor plugin configuration to sensors_plugin_config data structure
209  if (sensor_plugin_field_->currentIndex() == 1)
210  {
211  // Point Cloud plugin fields
212  config_data_->addGenericParameterToSensorPluginConfig("sensor_plugin", "occupancy_map_monitor/"
213  "PointCloudOctomapUpdater");
214  config_data_->addGenericParameterToSensorPluginConfig("point_cloud_topic",
215  point_cloud_topic_field_->text().trimmed().toStdString());
216  config_data_->addGenericParameterToSensorPluginConfig("max_range", max_range_field_->text().trimmed().toStdString());
217  config_data_->addGenericParameterToSensorPluginConfig("point_subsample",
218  point_subsample_field_->text().trimmed().toStdString());
219  config_data_->addGenericParameterToSensorPluginConfig("padding_offset",
220  padding_offset_field_->text().trimmed().toStdString());
221  config_data_->addGenericParameterToSensorPluginConfig("padding_scale",
222  padding_scale_field_->text().trimmed().toStdString());
223  config_data_->addGenericParameterToSensorPluginConfig("max_update_rate",
224  max_update_rate_field_->text().trimmed().toStdString());
225  config_data_->addGenericParameterToSensorPluginConfig("filtered_cloud_topic",
226  filtered_cloud_topic_field_->text().trimmed().toStdString());
227 
228  config_data_->changes |= MoveItConfigData::SENSORS_CONFIG;
229  }
230  else if (sensor_plugin_field_->currentIndex() == 2)
231  {
232  // Depth Map plugin fields
233  config_data_->addGenericParameterToSensorPluginConfig("sensor_plugin", "occupancy_map_monitor/"
234  "DepthImageOctomapUpdater");
235  config_data_->addGenericParameterToSensorPluginConfig("image_topic",
236  image_topic_field_->text().trimmed().toStdString());
237  config_data_->addGenericParameterToSensorPluginConfig("queue_size",
238  queue_size_field_->text().trimmed().toStdString());
239  config_data_->addGenericParameterToSensorPluginConfig("near_clipping_plane_distance",
240  near_clipping_field_->text().trimmed().toStdString());
241  config_data_->addGenericParameterToSensorPluginConfig("far_clipping_plane_distance",
242  far_clipping_field_->text().trimmed().toStdString());
243  config_data_->addGenericParameterToSensorPluginConfig("shadow_threshold",
244  shadow_threshold_field_->text().trimmed().toStdString());
245  config_data_->addGenericParameterToSensorPluginConfig("padding_scale",
246  depth_padding_scale_field_->text().trimmed().toStdString());
247  config_data_->addGenericParameterToSensorPluginConfig("padding_offset",
248  depth_padding_offset_field_->text().trimmed().toStdString());
249  config_data_->addGenericParameterToSensorPluginConfig(
250  "filtered_cloud_topic", depth_filtered_cloud_topic_field_->text().trimmed().toStdString());
251  config_data_->addGenericParameterToSensorPluginConfig("max_update_rate",
252  depth_max_update_rate_field_->text().trimmed().toStdString());
253 
254  config_data_->changes |= MoveItConfigData::SENSORS_CONFIG;
255  }
256  else
257  {
258  // Clear the sensors_plugin_config data structure
259  config_data_->clearSensorPluginConfig();
260  config_data_->changes ^= MoveItConfigData::SENSORS_CONFIG;
261  }
262  return true;
263 }
264 
265 void PerceptionWidget::sensorPluginChanged(int index)
266 {
267  if (index == 1)
268  {
269  // Point cloud form visible, depth map form invisible
270  point_cloud_group_->setVisible(true);
271  depth_map_group_->setVisible(false);
272  }
273  else if (index == 2)
274  {
275  // Depth map form visible, point cloud form invisible
276  point_cloud_group_->setVisible(false);
277  depth_map_group_->setVisible(true);
278  }
279  else
280  {
281  // All forms invisible
282  point_cloud_group_->setVisible(false);
283  depth_map_group_->setVisible(false);
284  }
285 }
286 
287 void PerceptionWidget::loadSensorPluginsComboBox()
288 {
289  // Only load this combo box once
290  static bool has_loaded = false;
291  if (has_loaded)
292  return;
293  has_loaded = true;
294 
295  // Remove all old items
296  sensor_plugin_field_->clear();
297 
298  // Add None option, the default
299  sensor_plugin_field_->addItem("None");
300 
301  // Add the two avilable plugins to combo box
302  sensor_plugin_field_->addItem("Point Cloud");
303  sensor_plugin_field_->addItem("Depth Map");
304 
305  // Load deafult config, or use the one in the config package if exists
306  std::vector<std::map<std::string, GenericParameter> > sensors_vec_map = config_data_->getSensorPluginConfig();
307  for (std::map<std::string, GenericParameter>& sensor_plugin_config : sensors_vec_map)
308  {
309  if (sensor_plugin_config["sensor_plugin"].getValue() ==
310  std::string("occupancy_map_monitor/PointCloudOctomapUpdater"))
311  {
312  sensor_plugin_field_->setCurrentIndex(1);
313  point_cloud_topic_field_->setText(QString(sensor_plugin_config["point_cloud_topic"].getValue().c_str()));
314  max_range_field_->setText(QString(sensor_plugin_config["max_range"].getValue().c_str()));
315  point_subsample_field_->setText(QString(sensor_plugin_config["point_subsample"].getValue().c_str()));
316  padding_offset_field_->setText(QString(sensor_plugin_config["padding_offset"].getValue().c_str()));
317  padding_scale_field_->setText(QString(sensor_plugin_config["padding_scale"].getValue().c_str()));
318  max_update_rate_field_->setText(QString(sensor_plugin_config["max_update_rate"].getValue().c_str()));
319  filtered_cloud_topic_field_->setText(QString(sensor_plugin_config["filtered_cloud_topic"].getValue().c_str()));
320  }
321  else if (sensor_plugin_config["sensor_plugin"].getValue() ==
322  std::string("occupancy_map_monitor/DepthImageOctomapUpdater"))
323  {
324  sensor_plugin_field_->setCurrentIndex(2);
325  image_topic_field_->setText(QString(sensor_plugin_config["image_topic"].getValue().c_str()));
326  queue_size_field_->setText(QString(sensor_plugin_config["queue_size"].getValue().c_str()));
327  near_clipping_field_->setText(QString(sensor_plugin_config["near_clipping_plane_distance"].getValue().c_str()));
328  far_clipping_field_->setText(QString(sensor_plugin_config["far_clipping_plane_distance"].getValue().c_str()));
329  shadow_threshold_field_->setText(QString(sensor_plugin_config["shadow_threshold"].getValue().c_str()));
330  depth_padding_scale_field_->setText(QString(sensor_plugin_config["padding_scale"].getValue().c_str()));
331  depth_padding_offset_field_->setText(QString(sensor_plugin_config["padding_offset"].getValue().c_str()));
332  depth_filtered_cloud_topic_field_->setText(
333  QString(sensor_plugin_config["filtered_cloud_topic"].getValue().c_str()));
334  depth_max_update_rate_field_->setText(QString(sensor_plugin_config["max_update_rate"].getValue().c_str()));
335  }
336  }
337 
338  // If no sensor config exists, default to None
339  if (sensors_vec_map.size() == 2)
340  {
341  sensor_plugin_field_->setCurrentIndex(0);
342  }
343 }
344
